column1: Little Goat Diner////It lived up to the hype. Didn't realize Girl & the Goat was closed on Sunday mornings
column2: so we went across the street to Little Goat Diner and were lucky enough to be able to sit almost immediately at the bar. I got the "parathas burrito" and my friend got the "this little piggy went to China". Both were literally amazing. I was surprised by the look of the parathas burrito (for obvious reasons
column3: was expecting a burrito) but it was perfect and not too heavy either. Would highly recommend!! We also started off our meal with a nice crab dip appetizer that was truly aces.
